articles.title: NVIDIA Pushes Out New GeForce Hotfix Driver 576.15, Addressing Display Crashing & GPU Temperature Sensor Issues - Wccftech
articles.description: NVIDIA has released a new hotfix for its GeForce driver, attempting to solve the troublesome display issues and a GPU temperature bug.
articles.content:
NVIDIA has released a new hotfix for its GeForce display driver, attempting to solve the "troublesome" display issues and a new GPU temperature bug.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot - TechCrunch
articles.description: Here's a ChatGPT guide to help understand Open AI's viral text-generating system. We outline the most recent updates and answer your FAQs.
articles.content: ChatGPT, OpenAIs text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to supercharge productivity through writing essays and code with sh… [+27884 chars]
